content:
FYI - not sure if there is a better way to cross post a topic from the Argonaut stream, but can we spend a few minutes on this on the call today:
Birth Sex

Specifically, 15588
I propose that we time box this to 5 minutes, and if there is any discussion, I'll defer it. However we can all agree quickly, I'd like to get the wording updated.
Are you going to propose a change to US Core ?
Yeah, if we pass it in PA today, I'll submit a gforge to US Core.
OK but will need to get the regulators blessing before we update US Core.
We didn't get to it in PA today, but we're going to try to get it sorted today or tomorrow. But I'd be very interested in being involved in discussion with the regulators :).
We are talking with LOINC about trying to get their description updated (which will also likely need ONC input before we actually do that because ONC was the one that submitted the LOINC request).
